title: BRIEF-Restaurant Brands International Announces Launch Of First Lien Senior Secured Notes Offering, Intention To Enter Into A New Term Loan Facility
text:
BRIEF-Restaurant Brands International Announces Launch Of First Lien Senior Secured Notes Offering, Intention To Enter Into A New Term Loan Facility

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Sep 06, 2019 08:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Restaurant Brands International Announces Launch Of First Lien Senior Secured Notes Offering, Intention To Enter Into A New Term Loan Facility Sept 6 (Reuters) - Restaurant Brands International Inc : * RESTAURANT BRANDS INTERNATIONAL INC. ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF FIRST LIEN SENIOR SECURED NOTES OFFERING AND INTENTION TO ENTER INTO A NEW TERM LOAN FACILITY AND AMEND REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY * RESTAURANT BRANDS INTERNATIONAL INC - LAUNCHED AN OFFERING OF $500 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF FIRST LIEN SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2028 * RESTAURANT BRANDS INTERNATIONAL - AMEND EXISTING REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY TO PROVIDE FOR UP TO $1,000 MILLION OF REVOLVING EXTENSION OF CREDIT OUTSTANDING * RESTAURANT BRANDS INTERNATIONAL INC -AMENDMENT INCLUDES A $125 MILLION LETTER OF CREDIT SUBLIMIT, TO EXTEND MATURITY DATE TO 2024
